job_description:
UI Engineer

About Us

Testing Mavens is a next-generation QA & Software Testing Services provider headquartered in New Jersey, USA, with offshore facilities in India. We have deep expertise in various spheres like Finance and Advisory, EdTech, Fashion and Pharmacy, etc. We partner with massive global brands to deliver excellent testing experience.

UI Engineer Work location – Local to Kerala

About the Role

We are seeking a skilled UI Engineer to design, develop, and optimize user interfaces for our web and mobile applications. The ideal candidate has strong technical expertise, an eye for detail, and a passion for creating seamless, user-friendly digital experiences. You will collaborate closely with UX designers, product managers, and backend engineers to bring intuitive and visually appealing interfaces to life.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop responsive, accessible, and high-performance user interfaces using modern front-end technologies.
  • Translate UI/UX design wireframes and prototypes into high-quality code.
  • Work closely with designers to ensure technical feasibility and maintain design accuracy.
  • Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs and ensure smooth user experiences.
  • Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and efficiency.
  • Maintain and evolve component libraries and design systems.
  • Identify and troubleshoot UI issues and performance bottlenecks.
  • Ensure UI consistency across platforms and devices.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging UI trends, frameworks, and best practices.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
  • 2–5+ years of experience in UI development or front-end engineering.
  • Strong proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
  • Experience with responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, and UI performance optimization.
  • Familiarity with design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
  • Understanding of RESTful APIs, JSON, and integration workflows.
  • Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Ability to collaborate in Agile/Scrum environments.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with TypeScript.
  • Knowledge of design systems and component-driven development.
  • Experience with CSS-in-JS frameworks (e.g., Styled Components, Emotion).
  • Exposure to UI testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Cypress, React Testing Library).
  • Understanding of accessibility (WCAG guidelines) and SEO best practices.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hire@testingmavens.com
summary: Seeking a UI Engineer to design and develop user interfaces for web/mobile apps. Requires 2-5+ years of experience in UI development with strong front-end skills.

job_description:
Cloud Architect - 10+ Years

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly skilled Cloud Architect with deep expertise in the Microsoft Azure ecosystem, strong hands-on experience in DevOps architecture, and extensive knowledge in building scalable microservices and event-driven systems. This role is pivotal in defining cloud strategy, establishing best practices, and partnering with cross-functional teams to deliver secure, scalable, and robust cloud-native solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Cloud Architecture & Design * Architect, design, and implement end-to-end Azure cloud solutions. * Build scalable, secure, high-availability architectures.

DevOps Architecture * Architect and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions. * Drive automation for infrastructure provisioning, configuration, deployment, and testing. * Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) via Terraform, Bicep, or ARM templates. * Strengthen observability using Azure Monitor, App Insights, Log Analytics, and distributed tracing.

Microservices & Event-Driven Architecture * Design domain-driven, cloud-native microservices. * Architect event-driven integrations using Service Bus, Event Hub, Event Grid. * Ensure system reliability, resilience, scalability, and fault tolerance.

Security, Governance & Compliance * Apply Azure security best practices in identity, networking, secrets, and data protection. * Define governance for cost, resource usage, and compliance. * Ensure cloud solutions align with Zellis and industry security standards.

Collaboration & Leadership * Work closely with development, data, security, and product teams to align architecture with business objectives. * Provide best practices, architectural guidance, and technical direction across teams. * Participate in solution reviews, estimations, feasibility studies, and technical design sessions. * Mentor engineering teams, conduct architectural walkthroughs, and support production readiness. * Collaborate effectively with UK-based stakeholders and cross-functional teams.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

Core Technical Skills * 8–12+ years in cloud or software architecture roles. * 4–6+ years hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure. * Strong expertise in: * Azure Networking Expertise (Mandatory) * Significant hands-on experience with: * DevOps Skills * Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions * CI/CD pipeline architecture * Infrastructure as Code (Terraform/Bicep/ARM) * Architecture & Design Expertise * Domain-Driven Design (DDD) * Messaging & integration patterns * Distributed systems * Scalability, reliability, and performance engineering

Soft Skills * Excellent communication skills, with ability to collaborate with UK customers and stakeholders.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at r.reshma@thinkpalm.com
summary: Seeking an experienced Cloud Architect skilled in Azure and DevOps. This role defines cloud strategy, builds scalable microservices, and ensures secure, robust cloud-native solutions.

job_description:

The ideal candidate will oversee project execution, guide development teams, and manage client interactions, requiring strong technical expertise, excellent communication skills, and end-to-end project management capabilities.

job_description:
Marketing Strategy & Research Internship

Duration: 3 Months Mode: Work from Home (Remote) Stipend: Unpaid (Certificate & Experience Provided)

About the Role

We are offering a 3-month virtual internship in Marketing Strategy & Research for enthusiastic students and fresh graduates. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in market research, strategy development, and data-driven marketing, while working directly with experienced professionals.

Key Responsibilities

  • Conduct secondary market research on industries, competitors, and customer segments.
  • Assist in developing marketing strategy frameworks for different services.
  • Work on customer persona creation, segmentation, and positioning exercises.
  • Support in preparing case studies, proposals, and pitch decks.
  • Track and analyze campaign results to prepare insightful reports.
  • Participate in brainstorming sessions with the strategy and creative team.

Learning Outcomes

  • Exposure to real-world marketing strategy development.
  • Practical experience in market research and competitor analysis.
  • Skills in strategy formulation, reporting, and presentations.
  • Direct mentorship and feedback from the leadership team.
  • Certificate of Completion & LinkedIn Endorsements (on successful completion).

Requirements

  • Currently pursuing or recently completed Bachelor’s/Master’s in Business, Marketing, or related field.
  • Strong interest in marketing strategy, branding, and research.
  • Good analytical skills with proficiency in MS Excel/Google Sheets & PowerPoint/Google Slides.
  • Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and disciplined to work in a remote environment.

Duration & Commitment

  • 3 Months (Work From Home)
  • Flexible working hours (minimum weekly commitment expected: 15–20 hours).

Perks

  • Internship Certificate
  • Work-from-home flexibility
  • Exposure to live projects & strategic assignments
  • Opportunity to publish co-authored blogs/case studies with the team
  • Recommendation/LinkedIn endorsement (based on performance)

Apply Now

Send your application with the subject line: “Marketing Strategy & Research Internship” to hr@konceptslab.com

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@konceptslab.com
summary: Virtual 3-month internship in Marketing Strategy & Research. Gain hands-on experience in market research and strategy development. Unpaid, remote role with flexible hours.

job_description:
AI Developer / Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Carnival Infopark, Cochin, Kerala Experience: 3 to 5 Years Employment Type: Full-Time, Permanent Work Mode: Hybrid

Role Description:

We are looking for an experienced AI Developer who will design, build, and implement intelligent automation solutions using cutting-edge AI technologies. Working closely with business stakeholders, you'll identify opportunities for innovation, prototype new ideas, and deliver scalable AI-driven systems that make a measurable impact.

What will you be doing?

  • Collaborating with business teams to uncover and define AI/automation opportunities.
  • Engineering and optimising prompts to ensure consistent, high-quality LLM outputs.
  • Building and deploying AI-powered workflows that connect LLMs with business applications, APIs, and automation tools.
  • Implementing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipelines to integrate enterprise data.
  • Rapidly prototyping and iterating on AI solutions to demonstrate business value.
  • Advising on responsible AI practices, governance, and compliance.
  • Staying ahead of the curve with emerging AI tools, frameworks, and trends.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Build, develop and deploy AI applications
  • Design and Develop AI services
  • Setup and develop data ingestion pipelines and components
  • Develop search related components using Azure AI Search
  • Developing and deploying AI/ML models
  • Built and maintain scalable, high-performance AI apps on Azure
  • Create and maintain secure AI platform
  • Collaborate cross-functionally to understand requirements

Preferred Skills & Qualifications:

  • Hands-on experience with LLMs (e.g. GPT, Claude, LLaMA, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Functions, and Logic Apps.) and prompt engineering.
  • Familiarity with LangChain, LlamaIndex, or similar frameworks.
  • Experience using automation platforms (UiPath, Power Automate, Zapier, n8n) and APIs.
  • Knowledge of vector databases and embeddings for RAG pipelines.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@sparksupport.com
summary: Seeking an AI Developer with 3-5 years of experience to design and implement intelligent automation solutions. Responsibilities include LLM integration, RAG pipelines, and building AI applications on Azure.

job_description:
Service Desk Engineer – Level 1

Job Designation: Service Desk Engineer – L1 Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite | 24×7 rotational shifts

Experience: 1–3 years in IT Helpdesk/Service Desk

About the Role:

The Service Desk Engineer will act as the first point of contact for all IT users, providing remote and desk-side support for incidents and service requests. The role ensures timely logging, categorization, initial troubleshooting, FCR resolution, and escalation to L2/L3 teams while maintaining SLA compliance and high customer satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities (Detailed):

  • Receive and handle all user issues through calls, emails, chat, and ticketing tools.
  • Log, categorize, and prioritize incidents and service requests.
  • Perform basic troubleshooting for OS, applications, network, and hardware.
  • Provide First-Call-Resolution (FCR) for L1 scope issues.
  • Escalate unresolved tickets to L2/L3 teams with complete diagnostics.
  • Track and follow up on assigned tickets until closure.
  • Monitor SLA response and resolution timelines and flag deviations.
  • Prepare daily/weekly/monthly helpdesk performance reports.
  • Maintain and update knowledge base articles, SOPs, and troubleshooting guides.
  • Conduct periodic user feedback and support CSAT target ≥99%.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong communication and customer handling skills.
  • Exposure to ITSM ticketing tools (ManageEngine, ServiceNow, etc.).
  • Basic knowledge: Windows OS, MS Office, printers, and network basics.
  • Ability to troubleshoot common issues (password, Outlook, VPN, etc.).
  • Understanding of incident, request, escalation, & SLA processes.
  • Ability to work in rotational shifts, including night shifts.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: L1 Service Desk Engineer provides first point of contact IT support. Responsibilities include issue resolution, escalation, and maintaining customer satisfaction in a 24/7 environment.

job_description:
Datacenter Operations Engineer – 24×7

Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite DC | Shift-based

Experience: 2–4 years in DC monitoring & operations

About the Role: Responsible for monitoring and managing all IT infrastructure components within the datacenter including servers, storage, network devices, firewalls, SSL certificates, and critical applications. Ensures that alerts are captured, validated, logged, and escalated as per SOPs.

Key Responsibilities (Detailed): - Monitor server CPU, memory, partitions, and availability. - Monitor OS-level and application services (DB, middleware, AD, etc.). - Monitor SAN/NAS & storage health parameters. - Monitor network devices (routers, switches, firewalls) for availability. - Track link status, bandwidth usage, packet drops, and interface issues. - Monitor SSL certificate expiries and coordinate renewals. - Identify critical alerts, validate, and raise tickets. - Coordinate with L2/L3 towers for patching and maintenance activities. - Ensure correct escalation for Sev1/Sev2 alerts. - Maintain daily DC health reports and monthly MIS.

Required Skills & Experience: - Good understanding of server OS (Windows/Linux). - Knowledge of network fundamentals (routing, switching, firewalls). - Familiarity with SAN/NAS storage. - Experience with monitoring tools (SolarWinds, Nagios, OpManager). - Strong analytical and alert-handling capability. - Ability to work in 24×7 DC environment.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Datacenter Operations Engineer needed for 24x7 monitoring and management of IT infrastructure. Responsibilities include alert handling, escalation, and reporting for servers, storage, and networks.

job_description:
BigFix Engineer (L2)

Job Designation: BigFix Engineer – Endpoint Tools Management (L2) Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite

Experience: 3–5 years in Endpoint/Patch Management Tools.

About the Role:

The BigFix Engineer will administer and maintain the IBM BigFix infrastructure used for enterprise-wide endpoint management and security compliance. This includes managing BigFix servers, relays, and clients; ensuring patch baselines are up to date; troubleshooting agent health; and ensuring all endpoints meet compliance standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage, maintain, and optimize the IBM BigFix Server, Relay Servers, and Client infrastructure.
  • Configure and update patch baselines, fixlets, tasks, and site subscriptions.
  • Monitor BigFix agent deployment, status, health, and version compliance.
  • Troubleshoot client issues related to agent communication, relay selection, and patch failures.
  • Manage BigFix WebUI, operator roles, permissions, and RBAC configurations.
  • Review dashboards for patch compliance and take corrective actions.
  • Coordinate patch deployment cycles with Windows/Linux/Infrastructure teams.
  • Generate reports on patching, compliance, software inventory, and vulnerabilities.
  • Perform upgrades, apply patches, and maintain platform stability.
  • Support software deployment and compliance policies using BigFix.
  • Document SOPs, patching procedures, and troubleshooting guidelines.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong hands-on experience with IBM BigFix architecture (Server, Relay, Client).
  • Experience with patch management across Windows & Linux endpoints.
  • Knowledge of BigFix Fixlets, Tasks, Baselines, Action Scripts, and Custom Content.
  • Understanding of endpoint compliance, vulnerability remediation, and OS hardening.
  • Familiarity with RBAC, AD integration, and role-based permissions.
  • Experience coordinating patch cycles in enterprise environments.
  • Strong troubleshooting and reporting skills.
  • Knowledge of PowerShell, Shell scripting (preferred).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Administer and maintain IBM BigFix for endpoint management and security. Responsibilities include server management, patch baselines, troubleshooting, and compliance monitoring.

job_description:
MS SQL Database Administrator – L2

Job Designation: MS SQL Database Administrator – Level 2 Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite

Experience: 3–5 years of MS SQL Server administration.

About the Role: As an MS SQL DBA, you will manage, maintain, and optimize SQL Server databases across production and DR environments. You will ensure performance tuning, high availability, backup/recovery readiness, and support day-to-day operations for banking and enterprise applications.

Key Responsibilities: - Manage installation, configuration, and administration of MS SQL Server databases - Perform regular backup & recovery using native SQL Server tools - Monitor performance metrics using SQL Profiler, DMVs, and Extended Events - Optimize slow queries, indexes, and database schemas - Perform patching, version upgrades, migrations - Monitor events, logs, deadlocks, blocking sessions - Implement high-availability (HA) methods: Failover Cluster, AlwaysOn AG - Perform security hardening and user/role management - Support application deployment and DB release activities - Participate in DR drills, replication verification, and failover testing - Provide daily monitoring reports & capacity planning inputs

Required Skills & Experience: - Strong hands-on knowledge of SQL Server 2012/2014/2016/2019 - Experience in AlwaysOn, clustering, backup/restore, log shipping - Strong T-SQL querying, troubleshooting, and performance tuning - Familiarity with SSIS, SSRS (added advantage) - Understanding of Windows Server OS & AD integration - Experience in banking/financial domain preferred - Good communication, RCA preparation & documentation skills

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Seeking an MS SQL DBA with 3-5 years of experience to manage and optimize SQL Server databases. Responsibilities include performance tuning, HA, backup/recovery, and daily operations support.
